title: Reversing Executable Package
content:
I have an 
.exe
file that loads some other files when executed, I need to redirect these files and export them. When debugging I know that there is a subfolder 
/images/%s.png
where the files in question are referenced. Is there any way to export these files? Thanks.

comments.text: I would suggest using app.any.run since it logs all the files the app created
